title: Posting in old polls
content:
Somebody around here thought it would be funny to vote in a whole bunch of ancient polls. It's not. Read the second guideline: 'Please do not reply to, or vote on, really old polls that are no longer actual.'

Why not? Because we don't like when you do.--------------------
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/]Cerebral Cortex 314[/url] - For All of your Commander Keen Needs.
[url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/dave/joes.html]Eat at Joes[/url]
